sch:rule.sch:assert: Update WIPConfirm must have a Header component specified
Update WIPConfirm must have at least one Line component specified
The WIP Confirm Line must have a "ReturnedQuantity" or "CompletedQuantity" or "ScrapQuantity" specified
The WIP Confirm Line must have a "ProductionOrderReference" specified
The WIP Confirm Line must have a "ShopFloorControlResource" component specified
The ShopFloorControlSubLine must have a "OperationId" specified.
The ShopFloorControlSubLine must have a "ShopFloorControlResource" component specified
The ShopFloorControlActivity must have a "ShopFloorControlActivity" component specified
The ShopFloorControlActivity must have a "Labor" or "Machine" or "Tool" specified
Labor must have a "EmployeeId" or "Category" specified.
Tool must have a "ToolId" or "ToolClassification" specified
Machine Must have a "Id " or "Classification" specified
The Production Order Rererence must have a "DocumentId" and an "Id" specified
